message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a product that I believe you will find very valuable.  Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  I could meet you halfway â€“ how about $10,250?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
